text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel great
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since Thursday?
I created a test react app, to get familiar with react, react-router and react-redux.
attachments.text: I created a test react app, to get familiar with react, react-router and react-redux.
attachments.title: What did you do since Thursday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today, I'll setup a pipeline and launch a template app on the cluster
attachments.text: Today, I'll setup a pipeline and launch a template app on the cluster
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.fallback:
Anything blocking your progress?
react-redux is very complex, and there is a barrier to my velocity in its complexity
attachments.text: react-redux is very complex, and there is a barrier to my velocity in its complexity
attachments.title: Anything blocking your progress?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
